column1: Family will receive friends on Wednesday
column3: 2015 from 5:00 pm to 9:00 pm at Osceola Memory Gardens
column5: FL. An evening service will be held during visitation at 7:00 pm. Funeral services will be celebrated on Thursday
column7: 2015 at 11:00 am also at Osceola Memory Gardens Funeral Home Kissimmee.
